label: Dry Cleaning and Laundry Services
description: Services that provide dry cleaning and laundry services for clothing and household items.

subcategories.label: Dry Cleaning
subcategories.description: Professional cleaning of clothing and household items using solvents instead of water.

subcategories.label: Laundry Services
subcategories.description: Services that provide washing, drying, and folding of clothing and household items.

subcategories.label: Clothing Alterations
subcategories.description: Services that provide alterations and repairs for clothing items.

subcategories.label: Commercial Laundry
subcategories.description: Services that provide laundry and dry cleaning services for businesses.

subcategories.label: Specialty Cleaning
subcategories.description: Services that provide cleaning and restoration for specialty items.
